game.name: Gravity Field
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 중력장 는 위도 아래도 없이 시간이 거꾸로 된 물체가 있는 우주 논리 퍼즐 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gravity Field is a spatial-logic puzzle game with time inverted objects, with no top or bottom.

reviewHighlights.text: Good concept but poor execution. Some gravity fields were confusing to use. No clues on how some puzzles work so you have to guess and glitch yourself...
